data.title: Tuition & Fees, Net Price
data.meta_description: Check out 2024 Tuition & Fees and 2025 estimated Costs at Arizona Christian.
data.text:
The 2024 tuition & fees of Arizona Christian University is $34,697 for first-year students. Its undergraduate tuition & fees is much higher than the average amount for similar schools' tuition of $24,607.

The tuition & fees has risen more than 5% this year (2024) at Arizona Christian.

92% of enrolled undergraduate students have received grants or scholarships and the average aid amount is $18,083. It could cover 52.12% of full tuition amount.

After receiving the financial aid, the net price (COA) is $38,004 including tuition, fees, books & supplies costs, and living costs.

Arizona Christian's 4-year tuition is $152,951, based on current tuition and change rate. The estimated 4-year COA including living costs and personal expenses is $248,782.

Undergraduate Program Tuition & Fees

For the academic year 2023-2024, the undergraduate tuition & fees at Arizona Christian University is $34,697. The 2024 undergraduate tuition has been risen by 8.95% compared to the previous year. Its undergraduate tuition & fees is much higher than the average amount for similar schools' tuition of $24,607.

The 2025 estimated undergraduate tuition & fees is $37,803 , a 9.0% increase compared to 2024's rate.

Cost Per Credit Hour

The below table describes the cost per credit hour for part-time students and/or full-time students who take additional courses more than regular credit hours at Arizona Christian.

The undergraduate cost per credit hour is $1,355.

Cost of Attendance with Living Costs and Books & Supplies

The living costs including for room, board, transpiration, and other personal expenses is $19,660 for year 2024. The on-campus living costs increased by 11.07% compared to the previous year. The off-campus living costs increased by 13.08% compared to the previous year.

The Arizona Christian's 2024 on-campus COA is $56,087 and off-campus COA is $59,157.
